Environment variable processing

Source: R/ENMunityenv.R
ENMunityenv.Rd

将不同来源的环境变量进行格式转换、重新投影到指定的研究区.

Usage

ENMunityenv(
  radir,
  refdir,
  proname = NULL,
  factors = NULL,
  method = "bilinear",
  res,
  format = "tif",
  outdir = NULL,
  overwrite = F,
  parallel = F,
  ncpu = 2
)

Arguments

radir

要处理的环境变量所在的路径

refdir

研究区范围的文件路径，如果是栅格(tif/asc)裁剪后的变量范围和分辨率与 栅格一致,如果是矢量(shp),裁剪后的变量范围与矢量一致，分辨率由res参数指定。

proname

投影时期的名字，如果提供必须是radir下的子文件夹的名字

factors

分类变量名，要与radir下的变量名称一致

method

连续变量的重采样方法，对于分类变量内部设置为near，可选bilinear,cubic,near等

res

numeric. Can be used to set the resolution of the output raster if ref is a SpatVector

format

输出变量格式

outdir

输出文件路径

overwrite

logical. If TRUE, filename is overwritten

parallel

是否并行

ncpu

并行的cpu数

Value

栅格文件

Examples

ENMunityenv(
  radir = "F:/example/env",
  refdir = "F:/var2/eblf_proj/present/tif/bio1.tif",
  proname = c("present", "acc2030ssp126", "acc2030ssp245"),
  outdir = "F:/example/env",
  overwrite = T,
  parallel = T,
  ncpu = 2
)
#> Error in loadNamespace(x): there is no package called ‘snowfall’
